member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute
member.summary: Used to specify deployment item (file or directory) per-test deployment for copying files or folders specified as deployment items to the .DeploymentDirectory. Deployment directory is where all the deployment items are present along with TestSource dll. Can be specified on test class or test method. Can have multiple instances of the attribute to specify more than one item. The item path can be absolute or relative, if relative, it is relative to RunConfig.RelativePathRoot.
member.remarks: If specified on a test class, the class needs to contain at least one test method. This means that the attribute cannot be combined with a test class that would contain only a AssemblyInitialize or ClassInitialize method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The file or directory to deploy. The path is relative to the build output directory. The item will be copied to the same directory as the deployed test assemblies.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The relative or absolute path to the file or directory to deploy. The path is relative to the build output directory. The item will be copied to the same directory as the deployed test assemblies.

The path of the directory to which the items are to be copied. It can be either absolute or relative to the deployment directory. All files and directories identified by will be copied to this directory.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.Path
member.summary: Gets the path of the source file or folder to be copied.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets the path of the directory to which the item is copied.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.MessageLevel
member.summary: Specifies the severity level of messages displayed using the API.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.MessageLevel.Informational
member.summary: The message will be displayed as informational, typically used for general updates or non-critical messages.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.MessageLevel.Warning
member.summary: The message will be displayed as a warning, indicating a potential issue or something requiring attention.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.MessageLevel.Error
member.summary: The message will be displayed as an error, representing a significant issue or failure.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext
member.summary: Used to store information that is provided to unit tests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.Properties
member.summary: Gets test properties for a test.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.CancellationTokenSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the cancellation token source. This token source is canceled when test times out. Also when explicitly canceled the test will be aborted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.CancellationToken
member.summary: Gets the cancellation token. This token is canceled when test times out. Also when explicitly canceled the test will be aborted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestData
member.summary: Gets or sets the test data for the test method being executed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestDisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets the test display name for the test method being executed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestRunDirectory
member.summary: Gets base directory for the test run, under which deployed files and result files are stored.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.DeploymentDirectory
member.summary: Gets directory for files deployed for the test run. Typically a subdirectory of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.ResultsDirectory
member.summary: Gets base directory for results from the test run. Typically a subdirectory of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestRunResultsDirectory
member.summary: Gets directory for test run result files. Typically a subdirectory of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestResultsDirectory
member.summary: Gets directory for test result files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.FullyQualifiedTestClassName
member.summary: Gets the Fully-qualified name of the class containing the test method currently being executed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestName
member.summary: Gets the name of the test method currently being executed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.CurrentTestOutcome
member.summary: Gets the current test outcome.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestException
member.summary: Gets or sets the exception that occurred in the TestInitialize or TestMethod steps.
member.remarks: The property is always null when accessed during the TestInitialize or TestMethod steps.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestRunCount
member.summary: Gets the current attempt of the test run. This property is relevant when using (or any implementation of ). On the first run, this property is set to 1. On subsequent retries, the value is incremented.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.AddResultFile(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file name to the list in TestResult.ResultFileNames.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Used to write trace messages while the test is running.

member.summary: Used to write trace messages while the test is running.

member.summary: Used to write trace messages while the test is running.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.WriteLine(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Used to write trace messages while the test is running.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.DisplayMessage(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.MessageLevel,System.String)
member.summary: Used to write trace messages while the test is running.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.Resources.FrameworkExtensionsMessages.ArgumentXMustDeriveFromClassY
member.summary: Type '{0}' is not assignable to '{1}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.Resources.FrameworkExtensionsMessages.AsyncUITestMethodWithNoDispatcherQueue
member.summary: UITestMethodAttribute.DispatcherQueue should not be null. To use UITestMethodAttribute within a WinUI Desktop App, remember to set the static UITestMethodAttribute.DispatcherQueue during the test initialization.
